xml:
<xml xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
  <block type="board" id=",E.k.q?owf(U8v]q?fE_" x="37" y="362">
    <field name="type_">usb</field>
    <statement name="callbacks_">
      <block type="bit_button_event" id=".bKm1u!gTHD^[w_H;017">
        <field name="var_">_bit_btnA_</field>
        <field name="event_">pressed</field>
        <statement name="do_">
          <block type="controls_repeat_ext_can_stop" id="h||8:VpHsc}v~TsRvBqt">
            <field name="async">FALSE</field>
            <value name="times_">
              <block type="math_number" id=";68r0:`~[+gzAToDTJO_">
                <field name="NUM">3</field>
              </block>
            </value>
            <statement name="do_">
              <block type="radio_channel_set" id="A^3Lxch(tv^t-!d+wB`m">
                <comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">發送廣播訊息後，才會繼續執行下方程式</comment>
                <value name="name_">
                  <block type="text" id=".tgz*uK#){ioz^-zMyWM">
                    <field name="TEXT">1</field>
                  </block>
                </value>
                <value name="msg_">
                  <block type="text" id="-8O^[C(7{B_rDORTv7*I">
                    <field name="TEXT">I LOVE U</field>
                  </block>
                </value>
              </block>
            </statement>
          </block>
        </statement>
        <next>
          <block type="radio_channel_get" id=";+bDaUDN7M!QL=HX6[z,">
            <comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">獨立使用，不需放在迴圈積木內，就能持續偵測頻道。</comment>
            <value name="name_">
              <block type="text" id="A:dmKyT8aRf7yEX=o?l2">
                <field name="TEXT">1</field>
              </block>
            </value>
            <statement name="do_">
              <block type="bit_matrix_string_once" id="g)]rM/oepZu;iz_lntg1">
                <field name="type_">1</field>
                <field name="speed_">2</field>
                <comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">若選擇一次，在跑馬燈結束後才會繼續執行下方程式</comment>
                <value name="str_">
                  <block type="radio_channel_value" id="ah`=o#axd}mDEss.;;3y"></block>
                </value>
                <value name="color_">
                  <block type="colour_picker" id="c0v!P/*5kSa-zu7EIeVY">
                    <field name="COLOUR">#333399</field>
                  </block>
                </value>
              </block>
            </statement>
            <next>
              <block type="bit_button_event" id="C;e|:FfLFm-s+q2ZT-^i">
                <field name="var_">_bit_btnB_</field>
                <field name="event_">pressed</field>
                <statement name="do_">
                  <block type="bit_matrix_off" id="r!!h,L0y}*-qK0rNYew|"></block>
                </statement>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </next>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
</xml>
